localString.value: The Guardian is bathed in magical light. Although appearing as a statue, his eyes look upon you and seem to beckon. You wonder what powers he may have at his call.

If you have any type of bindstone, the guardian will take it from you so that you will not be infected with the Fugue Bug, which traps you here instead of porting you to your temple.
Current BindStones: Temple of Lloth Stone Loknar Stone Brosna Stone Black Hills Stone
Apologies from the Gods for this inconvenience.
A bulletin board to read and post messages. A scribe is needed to write a message.
This will block portalling into the area via the temple portal and out of the area via the pendant. Place anywhere in the area to be protected.
